text:
Hey Guys good morning (here in Brazil).

Guys i dont know if this is the corret chananel, but i hve a questions whicth i wuld like to share and see if some one can help us, and thank you so much a redy!

So, i plan to move on my website from the hubSpot CMS for the Wordpress, and i really worried about lose informtion of my trafic, channel of aquisition and leads bout, like Google and Meta...

Actually i think the most importan par it is have a solid parametres traked in the trafic channels, corret? Cause, they send the information (like Tag.Maneger and Pixel...) to the HubSpot CRM, who in this case work storing the information, rigth?

So, i wuld like to know whit some one ever have a troble like that in this processe in the same migratiion, usineg the HubSpot native intregation whit Worldpres?

Some one have a recomendiont about this tema?

Realy appriciatte any response...
How do we migrate from a developer account to a production account?  are there migration tools?
Reminder: Migrating a WordPress blog to HubSpot? check this out: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/blog/import-your-wordpress-blog-into-HubSpot>
